item.title: Police called to report a Car crash. Damage to three concrete bollards. Remnants of bollards on the carriageway., 10th October
item.description:
Police called to report a Car crash. Damage to three concrete bollards. Remnants of bollards on the carriageway. Manhole cover is loose and insecure. Wickham Road. Junction of Tudor Road,BR3 6RD WRW : Pounds / Weedy / Haven Police Ref: 8861/101025
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 82, Wickham Road, Beckenham, London

item.title: Street drainage blocked outside 52 Mainridge Road, BR7 6DW, 10th October
item.description:
The occupants of 52 Mainridge Road employed contractors to clean their weed infested block paving front garden. Unfortunately the contractor has not cleared the waste and allowed it to gather in the street below the kerb Blocking the street drainage.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mainridge Road, Coldharbour, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish being left in the street by regularly visiting car, 10th October
item.description:
Amount of unhygienic rubbish and bottles being left on the street at the. closed junction of Manor Lane Terrace and Kellerton Road used (unpleasantly) used tissues and rubbish just left on the street after. car White Audi EU63 OOB. parks there two or three times a week from. 1800 hours to 2300 Hours with two people in it doing goodness knows what- You camera at the junction should pick this up - Flytipping and. not very nice - it is a mess
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kellerton Road, Hither Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2nd fly tip this week, 10th October
item.description:
On Wednesday I reported a large industrial fly tip. The next day more has appeared in the same spot. I believe although have no proof this is from the new ice cream shop next to the glades. This is industrial waste and from a shop / restaurant . The same as the first fly tip
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Churchill Way, Plaistow, London

item.title: Smoke and Air Quality Concerns from Boats on Lee River / end of Riverside Close Area, 10th October
item.description:
We’ve noticed that the heating season has started, and the air quality along the Lee River (at the end of Riverside Close) has become quite bad again. Some people on boats seem to be burning unpleasant materials in their stoves, producing thick, irritating

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Riverside Close, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trees leaning and a threat to our property and outbuildings, 10th October
item.description:
Hi We were told years ago that a few trees not in our jurisdiction couldn't be cut down or trimmed to the core. Please can you analyse and have an officer come to the external part of our property. This is affecting our insurance and we cannot lie. I look forward to hearing from you soon. Kind regards Mr. Nandra 5 Clive road Belvedere Kent DA175BJ
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lessness Park, Lessness Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet
